mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO ,MEM_NO ,(SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = MEM_NO) AS NAME ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT ,MOD_DT ,DEL_YN FROM BOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, MEM_NO, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(BOARD_NO)+ 1 FROM BOARD), #{mem_no}, #{title}, #{content})
